body_html: @petewarden Working on RNN as part of DeepSpeech and trying to get things up and running, I have been relying on that patch for a while already. You may want to be aware that a slight variation is actually required otherwise there's a very big performance impact. I have not been the only one observing this, as you can see at #7162 (comment)
body_text: @petewarden Working on RNN as part of DeepSpeech and trying to get things up and running, I have been relying on that patch for a while already. You may want to be aware that a slight variation is actually required otherwise there's a very big performance impact. I have not been the only one observing this, as you can see at #7162 (comment)
body: @petewarden Working on RNN as part of DeepSpeech and trying to get things up and running, I have been relying on that patch for a while already. You may want to be aware that a slight variation is actually required otherwise there's a very big performance impact. I have not been the only one observing this, as you can see at https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/7162#issuecomment-307994191
